title: Introduction: The Power of Image in Banking
image_desc: A photo of a modern, clean bank branch with happy employees interacting with customers.
content: - Understanding the importance of image for bank success.
Setting the stage for personal and professional branding.
narration: Welcome, everyone! Today, we're exploring how a strong image impacts our bank's success, and how you can build your own powerful personal brand.  We'll cover key elements for both personal and professional branding, and how they contribute to a positive customer experience.

title: Financial Impact of Branding: The Pia Wurtzbach Example
image_desc: A professional headshot of Pia Wurtzbach alongside a graph showing brand value growth.
content: - Case study: Pia Wurtzbach's brand and its influence.
How strong branding translates to financial success for individuals and organizations.
Linking this to the bank's bottom line.
narration: Let's look at Pia Wurtzbach. Her strong personal brand translates into lucrative endorsements and opportunities.  Similarly, a positive bank image attracts customers, builds trust, and ultimately boosts our financial performance.

title: Branding Your Personal Image:  First Impressions Matter
image_desc: A collage showing examples of professional attire, positive body language, and a well-maintained online profile.
content: Positive body language and communication skills.
narration: Your personal brand is how you present yourself.  This includes your appearance, your communication style, and even your online presence.  Making a great first impression is crucial for building trust with customers and colleagues.

title: Workplace Etiquette and Netiquette: Professionalism in Action
image_desc: An infographic depicting proper phone etiquette, email best practices, and positive online interactions.
content: Email and online communication best practices.
Maintaining a respectful and professional demeanor in all interactions.
narration: Professionalism extends to how we communicate.  Answering the phone politely, writing professional emails, and maintaining respectful online interactions are all key to projecting a positive image for the bank.

title: Interactive Activity: Rocking the Bank's Image
image_desc: A photo of a group of people brainstorming around a table, with a whiteboard filled with ideas.
content: - Brainstorming session: Ideas to improve the bank's image.
narration: Now, let's work together! We'll brainstorm ideas on how we can improve our bank's image.  Your input is valuable, and we'll discuss actionable steps we can take to implement these improvements.

title: Customer Stress Management Techniques: Prioritizing Self-Care
image_desc: An image depicting relaxation techniques like deep breathing or meditation, alongside a happy customer interacting with a calm bank employee.
content: Strategies for managing stress and maintaining composure.
The importance of self-care for providing excellent customer service.
narration: Dealing with challenging customers can be stressful.  We'll discuss techniques to manage stress, maintain composure, and prioritize your well-being.  Remember, taking care of yourselves allows you to provide the best possible service to our customers.
